name: Early Bird / React.js
description: Early Bird is a React.js application that provides real-time weather data for any location, that dynamically updates the background with stunning images provided by an external API, relevant to the current weather conditions and time of day.

name: Shady Shader / React.js
description: This React.js application takes the user through a curated color pool paired with their respective playful names, all provided by an external API. The selected colors will be applied to the background as a gradient, the user is free to randomize each color individually.

name: Color Shuffler / JavaScript
description: A simple color shuffler  that display curated colors via user input, placing them in background. This is my first project to consume an API.

name: Current Time / JavaScript
description: My very first project, a simple digital clock, shows the system time on a 12h format with a 24h toggle button, followed by a greet, changing the page elements accordingly
